yttjLkbnzxmPW_VfTTHLZw.text: The guy working there was nice. Their food is not great at all. There is a full bar, which is nice. There is nothing on draft (all bottles). But they accept credit cards, so that is good.

9a7ctYM9NmotsYwn50r7DA.text: Food is great and the staff is amazing! There is always a fun atmosphere when I go in for brunch or a drink at night!

Vc9I_eu4dJMGkT6hMkT9CA.text: Went here on a Saturday for lunch I was the only one there and sat at the bar. The bartender was super friendly and nice and made a really good Bloody Mary. It was pretty spicy and had a few olives and a cucumber and lime which was nice. I ordered a BLT and fries. The fries were excellent. They were steak fries and really hot and crispy. The sandwich was not the best thing I've ever had. The marble rye was nicely toasted but the bacon was just a little too hard. I would come back and try a different sandwich or a dessert.  The bartender mentioned the desserts are made by a famous phoenix baker.  Overall reasonably priced and have a friendly staff.

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bloody Mary was really good and nice and spicy!!

gSsb3QfoW4R-0MHgX2qyAw.text: I ordered the Scottsdale salad, it was served with raw chicken. Not only that but the waitress had a bit of attitude when we were just asking questions about the menu. Small little place, good beer, but I wouldn't recommend it.

ktpsJo-6MFkkpZPOvFDt5w.text: Yes this is a very very small bar that gets exceptionally loud...The food here more than makes up for that...SERIOUSLY...I've been coming here since 04, and the food and staff is absolutely fantastic!  The Green Mary Lou is a must have....The Queso Dip they serve is top notch!  All burgers, sandwiches and salads are way above average at a fair price for Scottsdale!  I absolutely love this little place! I'm all about flavor and quality when it comes to eating out and this place never fails.  If Heidi is working the experience is even better!  She's a superstar deluxe!

vTJLmSLgPaBIyUmScI5Sgg.text: Very friendly. Great soup, decent sandwiches. Central location next to big public parking lot. A good Apple-cranberry crisp.

LyqfpPzC4y33MaZqxgKV1Q.text: Was here for superbowl weekend. Loved the green mary lou, the black butte porter, and my wife fell in love with the bartender's blueberry lemonade. All good stuff in a tiny bar on a side street. I heard the other food is great too but didn't have a chance to try it all.   This place gets 5 stars for being more than what it is trying to be. Dive bar-ish but great food. Quick friendly service to locals and non locals alike. The bald bartender dude was very cool.

xarMTVWCDg2UVlujMfykpw.text: Just browsing around scottsdale, and came in Karsens  Grill. Had the Buffalo wings which where off the chain delicious. Quesadilla was the best I've had in a looong time. Great costumer service, friendly atmosphere.  Just as the signs says:  "If good things come in small packages,then Karsens is your kinda place". Will definitely  be back. Keep it up guys !

8l-4ViIMeRGaVLkOJeAP3Q.text: last min option when you really don't have a whole lotta time ...... its a great place. friendly staff fast service for being a sports local pub tavern kinda place in the heart of oldtown and also convienient because its right next door to the salon where I work. win win....

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Haha!!

OI6MVlXRNC17GrluBwFIjw.text: Very friendly staff in this small restaurant. The Philly Cheese Steak was awesome. Wasn't so thrilled about the Los Gigantes, a margarita made with Blood Orange. The honey mustard dressing has a strong sourness to it but it's not bad.

yM05oa3oRpKuKrqH7F6F5g.text: How this place has these reviews is beyond me. It's a small bar. No character. Food was terrible, the kind of nachos I'd expect to get in Poland.  Awful. Avoid.

43xmI5WKt4LN5SkYCeb7vg.text: Very very good food! Large portions. Great homemade fries! We tried the teriyaki chicken sandwich, the burger, and the French dip - all were excellent! Great little place, friendly staff, has limited indoor and outdoor seating - great bargain for your money!

RWDxyz2RgSJXWBK4BR623w.text: 3.5 stars Super, super small place. They only have bottled beer and no drink specials. The bartender also waited our table - he was an older gentleman who was very friendly and entertaining. The service was fast, and the food was pretty good. The appetizer was $2 off (food special) so it was worth it. If you're in the mood for a small bar with reasonably priced and reasonably tasting food, this place is worth visiting. I would have given this place 4 stars if they had better drinks/drink specials.   Appetizer: Green Mary Lou: reminded me of a crispier, thicker quesadilla. A little heavy and greasy but really good! Would have gone really well with a dark beer.  Entrees: 1) Karsen's Burger: simply dressed burger, but the meat was pretty good 2) Portobello veggie sandwich which was stacked!

wcTgsAPxpQZa9QYpTVoicA.text: Best bar in Old Town.  Incredibly friendly staff with delicious Tracy Dempsey desserts.  Always a great place to meet a character or two.  A couple of my food favorites beyond the desserts are the fresh made soups, any sandwich, and, of course, the nachos.  Really, you cannot go wrong.  They have a fun Sunday brunch and if you are in town for Spring Training this should be your first stop.

tS7G8S1e8eAkDwy2HxR4sw.text: I actually just placed an order for pick up.  The place was packed and kind of cramped, but my food was ready as promised right on time.  I got a chicken sandwich and a burger - 19.06, ouch!  The burger was a bit bland.  The meat was pretty good, but just needed a little seasoning.  The onion roll and accompaniments were standard.  The steak fries were definitely done right - not one of them was limp and not crispy.  The spicy chicken sandwich was very good.  I liked this a lot better than the burger.  The coleslaw I got as a side for it though was bland and watery.    All in all, its got a hefty price tag but ingredients are good and food is cooked right.  Nothing a little salt won't fix.  Place gets packed but the service seems very good considering.

am49zGRpYTjAmZRkrnQ-RQ.text: We came here on a Sunday afternoon hoping to eat decent bar food. Much to our surprise, this small, homey bar exceeded all of our expectations. We ordered the Green Mary Lou appetizer which was very good. My wife ordered the portobello sandwich which she absolutely devoured and I ordered the Karsen's Burger which was delicious as well.   The service was top notch and I found it amusing, yet extremely satisfying that the patron gave us a "play by play" countdown on when each dish would be coming out to be served.  4.5 stars

Fv8-FX5toUiP8EW10v71EA.text: Walking into this place I thought we may have made a mistake. 6 small tables and an eight seater bar. Kinda dark and very bar-like. The Jimmy came over and immediately made us feel welcome. There is a lot that I can talk about but there is one thing that makes everything else meaningless. The French Dip here is probably the most amazing sandwich I've  had in years. Each bite gave me a mini "O" and I crave more. I saddened as each bite vanished in my mouth but then immediate rejoiced as the beef juices reached my taste buds. When I finished my mouthed longed for another but my stomach was screaming for me to stop. I am not joking. I would light punch a sleeping baby in the stomach if it meant I could have one of these French dips. If you have a layover in Phoenix you need to break FAA rules, run out through security and get to Scottsdale. You don't want to miss this.

NDcxVZLJf_1Y44b6GRyLtw.text: We used to go here a lot years ago. But a move north a bit took it out of the flight path so... it was time to go back and check it out.  As always.... the owner/bartender/waiter/janitor/greeter was doing his thing running around and keeping us in drinks and food.  The drinks were good a always (no short pours here that i've had) and the food great. i didn't have but the burgers were big and juicy looking and the salad with cajun chicken was great. BEST honey mustard dressing i ever had.  Anyhow, glad i went and will be back sooner. It's small, with 6 tables and the 10 seat bar but... close friends and fun can be found here.  ENJOY IT.... and worth the trip for this small almost out of the way place.  I'd give it 5 stars but it was a bit noise (part of the charm except when you're trying to talk) and our waitress could have been better looking.  :-)  (sorry John)

r3YFlfIy4UlqmiiTbr8N5A.text: Found it by strolling through Old Town, liked the look/feel from the outside and peeked in and like it even more.  Mah/pop joint for 22 years the last 19 by same two partner's.  Very friendly bartender and server/owner greeted us immediately, as sat ourselves in this small quaint lil joint, most accompanied by locals, but did have the usual tourist of which we are.  Full bar, menu of usual bar/grill fare, but we dug it.  A club sammy and the special today, the pulled pork sammy.  Both solid, not too anything including grease or sauce so that was nice.  Great steak cut fries and potato salad to match.  Bottomless soda and iced tea.  Great place regularly checking back if we wanted anything, if it was to our liking and offering to top off our drinks.  We understand the desert is bomb, but didn't have any room for it.    Check it out!

Qyy5CNB6UfjMnYwanbJrXw.text: Really enjoyed this little place. Awesome food, great margaritas, friendly service. We had a party of 7 with a few prone to giving any server a hard time, but she took everything with a smile and never let anything bother her. She kept our drinks full and gave us great food recommendations. None of us left unhappy with what we ordered - everything was delicious!

auQnO7oJ0SCxPI81BI3S-w.text: If I wasn't a local (I am), and I was looking for somewhere great to eat, this would be the place I would want to know about. I'm not sure how we've gone almost 2 years living here without eating at Karsen's, but my life and my taste buds will never be the same!   This place most definitely is your dream dive bar- friendly service (our waiter/bartender was amazing), great food, and great vibe. The place is small, and best suited for small groups (Maybe 10 tables in the whole place) but totally worth it!   We split the fried mac & cheese bites, I had the Karsen's Kuban and my boyfriend had the Southwest Cardiac- He swears the burger was the best burger he had ever had, and my Kuban was amazing.   Overall, we've decided Karsen's Grill is our new hangout spot and we can't wait to eat our way throughout the entire menu!

3Q0WTVBGfLiRGcBnOd-nLQ.text: This bar has a lot of character. Friendly staff, good food and great customer service. We will definitely stop by there again when we are back in town!

9dv2XkQKASF_MYfEpPch9g.text: After spending considerable time looking on yelp for a place with good food at a reasonable price, we went to Karsen's.  The food was good, but we were really turned off by the bums rush we got as soon as the place started getting crowded. A water glass was practically taken from one of our hands in a not so subtle effort to send us in our way as soon as we paid our bill. Very rude! Most come in for a drink, we paid for full meals and still got rushed out. We were not there for more than an hour. Won't be returning or recommending this place to anyone.

HjdjyROijLf4E9e9Zt1-Rw.text: The atmosphere and our server was 5. My fiance had the bologna sandwich. He loved it! If we lived in Scottsdale he would be back at least once a week for it. I had a cup of cream of cheddar and broccoli soup for my snack and that's where they loose a star. It was SO salty! I only had 1/2 the CUP to be nice but really should've sent it back.

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fried bologna sandwich. Very yummy!

VSG7BUNEyfZFkFhZGZmQyw.text: This place was great! Ordered drinks here while watching the World Cup. The drinks were reasonably priced and the atmosphere was cozy. The fries we got were absolutely amazing! Seriously, probably my favorite ever.

jn_uekMNgcBzeq1zTzQ5OA.text: Tried a salad here to-go and it ended up being pretty good. Some of the lettuce was a bit rough around the edges, but the topping were first class. The chicken chunks were very plentiful and the avocado, corn and other veggies were of good quality. The dressing was a key to the modest success of the salad. The salad was 10 bucks, but in hindsight, although decent, stick to the sandwiches next time. The menu has changed also, it seems much more limited now.

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Cobb

ut70XkAUEIGDpCqN34Gr-A.text: Found this place thanks to Yelp. Food was amazing! Price was just right. Nice little spot in Downtown Scottsdale. The bartender/waiter was attentive but not intrusive.  Came for a spring training trip with the fellas and this was arguably one spot where we all said we'd come back too. It's a super small place that holds maybe 25 people or so. It has a New Port Beach/Huntington Beach feel with the music and decor. I ordered the wings and fries, wow! Wings were perfectly cooked and the fries were amazing! If I'm back in Scottsdale, I'll make sure I eat here again.

mVQsI-1V4TuORBFexa2XeA.text: Great little place in old town.  Friendly and fast service, cold beer and really good food.

Gt_Pr5kB4o-9dQ82oslQuA.text: OK OK OK seriously this place is the bomb Rocky who is the bartender and co-owner is one chill dude. The food is fantastically freaking amazing. If you do not try the french fries then someone shoudl slap your mamma.Also the chicken wings with just salt n pepper are to die for. I live in south central Phx and have been back 4 times in one month. Absolute home run for upgraded "bar food"

pAU-bojeK2j9gIWhi2A-Cw.text: Their sandwiches are incredible! Wick was our bartender/sever and was super friendly and knowledgeable of the menu. He definitely added to the family feel of the place

SlQSouB9iZ6pU70fJ2U3ug.text: Lunch at Karsen's today was great. I had a hard time deciding between the Kuban, the patty melt or Finley's Philly. Settled on the Philly and it was the BOMB!!  It was the best I've had - tender meat, onions sliced just right, perfect blend of flavorings. Wanting to try the patty melt, I was happy when my coworker asked to trade halves. It was also very good with excellent seasonings and the onions sauteed perfectly . Our other coworker ordered the Kuban and all I can say is "next time". Everything was soo good including the service!

jWYrKwE2rxMxcPzfyX6SDQ.text: Great atmosphere and warm, friendly servers.  Heidi is awesome! Thank you for making us feel very welcome !

lMgyi31HIq6vO9uuTf3vWg.text: Amazing! Stopped by after a Giants Spring training game and had the Southwest Cardiac Burger. Perfectly cooked goodness. we came back on day 2 and had the Club. Highly recommend, can't wait to come back next season

CJdqJIcjiGjzALssYz8MaQ.text: Friendly and small bar/food. Great drinks and the food was good. We shared the Mac and cheese with smoked chicken and bacon!! Delicious and next time we will each get our own!!

wxboTtm3GUHSe_H7eBVjxg.text: We went here based on the reviews and weren't disappointed! Food was amazing and service was spot on! Heidi, the bartender was super helpful and accommodating!

Zsxwqy-MMIG0tv1CXUnAKQ.text: Great place. Small joint but that adds to the character here. Food was amazing. Jalapeno club was excellent. Burger with fries was perfect and onion rings were hot and crispy.   Highly recommended. I will be back.

sWhMS3OzgUeBDEsgXAj2vA.text: We were touring Old Town Scottsdale when we ran across this small, friendly bar and grill. We stopped in for a drink, and were very pleased with the atmosphere, the service, and the drinks.

BJlNTfbkviZbD5krcuef0A.text: Fish tacos are to die for. Amazing service and amazing staff. Will be back soon. Maybe even tomorrow :)

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. So good I forgot to take a pic.. and I didn&#39;t even want to stop after I started to take a pic.

Ib-sjAX0cgTSygmzmch3sQ.text: Owner was very involved and friendly. Sandwiches are very good and a little different spin on old favorites.  Lunch was busy, but not packed. Friendly atmosphere, very casual.

BG1h-izYyRSOefgkABxCAQ.text: Scotty is a funny bartender, great little hidden bar in Old town that isn't overpriced for food. I do miss Kenny's food specials however.

IAmBYpeGXpF6nd-2948RzA.text: Love Karsen's! Service and people are wonderful, make you feel at home. Best food in Old Town-a must go to place when in Scottsdale, AZ. We go here every time we are in Scottsdale.

RGgXrNY5DNqgAcQ0Srnbfg.text: Wonderful atmosphere and fabulous unpretenious food in the heart of old town. The service was on top of everything and the crowd was enjoyable and fun. Highly recommend. The chicken salad wrap and onion rings were delicious and large portions.

8pKmDcGJSN0Y3-Y41FGYgQ.text: Great little hole in the wall bar in Old Town!!! This place has been around for a long time and am glad to see this place doing so well. It's small but has a big attitude... There drinks are what you would expect at any bar but there food really stands out.  Start with the Chicken Nachos and Deep Fried Mac n Cheese. Really good and different. Finish up with Chicago Dog and masked your way to the local gym to burn off 10,000 calories.

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Nachos = Yum
Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chicago Dog...
Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

ZQ6UIIokq90-8DX0VSvSew.text: Don't let the fact that this is a tiny bar dissuaded you from coming hwre. The food here is fucking good! I was really shocked by the quality of the food. I ordered a french dip with steak cut fries. All the sandwitches and nurfers come with a side. The french dip was amazing and had a horshradish sauce on the top which was really unique. Full of flavor and delicious. The fries were well seasoned and really filling. I also got a chance to try my friend's salt and pepper wings which were amazing. I loved the portion sizes. The service is great and very helpful. I'm not from the area, but if I was I would definetly return.

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

e0isI3sTfBncWl0g4--Dvw.text: I had high hopes based on the YELP photos of food and reviews, but sometimes it's all bogus. Oh well this small Old Town Scottsdale bar is a nice watering hole but the food is tasty but not stellar based on photos. Most of the items posted on Yelp weren't even available to purchase so be warned before coming in.  Ok , so I did sample a few items. Chili was interesting and tasty yet it was more soupy than a chili. FYI order a cup it's a large serving. Buffalo wings very good with a nice kick to them so you won't be disappointed. However the Mac n Cheese deep fried sticks were a bust. Didn't taste very good with green glow to them. Something I'd skip if you want Franks thoughts on the matter.  Bar is few blocks from the San Fransisco Giants spring training stadium so you can cocktail it up before or after the game. I'm sure you'll find the place a cool hangout but my thoughts are the cuisine wasn't stellar.   *** Note the help was exceptional and the lady running the bar was outstanding , helpful and very attentive to our needs. Bravo

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chilli
Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac &amp; Cheese sticks
Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

sjeJuJop2eiQNo5VAWghIA.text: In town for Memorial Day weekend with local friends and I am so happy we stopped in! The bar tender Rocky hooked it up with the sweet potato fries and tomato bisque!!! Let me tell to definitely order BOTH!!! Best tomato bisque I have EVER had! Just the smell of the sweet potato fries made me satisfied  I will be back again and again!

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

9zYL3eUGxFjoF9uFB4xUDg.text: Found this place on Yelp and it did not disappoint.  Great little place to eat or have a drink.  Staff was friendly, service was quick and food outstanding.   The place is a little small with more of local bar type feel, maybe not so good for a family with small kids.  But for the adults in the group, definitely worth a try.

i-tcDqpxdbLDFBvKI6bcvQ.text: I've NEVER posted on yelp, but, enjoyed this place so much, I couldn't resist! Hedi is probably the best waitress we've ever had! First time visiting this place! Met our family, who was visiting from Ohio and the service and food were all AMAZING! Thank you so much for taking excellent care of our loud group! Will definitely go back! Sharon C

9Z1BzS0Rlc2ycMpZJfu25Q.text: A small hole in the wall place with delicious food!! Hamburgers, sandwiches, and onion rings were stellar. Two people in our party thought they had some of the best burgers of their life here. Good selection of beers on tap. Nice bartenders who also serve the food and create the great music playlist which was rocking. A local hangout. Serve dinner late, but not until 1 pm as it says on Yelp. We ate at 11 pm and food service stopped right after that. Call to verify if you are heading there late. Go! Do not miss!!

QlRyzL7jW5XoyY69HBm5Cw.text: WOW. So glad we found this place. Not your typical grill. Grilled tortillas with green chili & machaca. Jalepeno brined pickles, fried bologna sandwich, and did i say a variety of amazing southwestern. All homemade. 6 tables and a bar that seats 8. HIGHLY recommend.

Z7PiDzwnzifcHI-oLrWPXw.text: We mb i love this place.  We come here all the time.  Great atmosphere.   Not too loud to hear ybniojbtgkuo

M-AY7zceXKtPvYwH7PVi8A.text: Awesome atmosphere in Old Town!!  Amazing staff and the salt and pepper wings are a MUST have!!!  Thanks Rocky for the great service!!!

x3H9QAwDcmrI0QaO4xq4YQ.text: All freshly and house made food.  I enjoyed the 1st street chop and husband enjoyed his Cuban and steak fries. Definitely recommend!

6U39nImPTVYjuSS7eV9DQA.text: The older man with the goatee and the hat gave me a shitty look as soon as I walked in and again after I nicely and politely asked for the food and beer menu. Then he pointed me to the wall and said all our beers are there on the ledge, and walked away   I don't take bs, so I simply walked out and will never return

5S5mwo_kwprpnf_Gmc2eKg.text: Delcious food, great atmosphere, accomodating staff. Would recommend to anyone I know!

BOz2okq2DDJswmTyBwE2rw.text: Super friendly place.  I ordered the green chili pasta and it was amazing.  Just a wonderful experience.

qijzM2pstgYeO2bFqMvaag.text: Wow. You absolutely MUST try the fries. Blew us away. The nachos were great as well and barely a chip was left uncovered with cheese. The salsa was so good as well and I am partial to my own homemade salsa so this is a True compliment.   The menu is small but has a nice and unique selection of items, so much so that we know we will be coming back to try everything!   Look, my first order was: the nachos, a side of fries, AND a Jalapeno Club to go. To go. I ordered food to go before even eating my main meal. What? Yes. It is that good.

yjGfwOX9tw3WI2evJn4GeQ.text: Really delicious food in a small but comfortable and friendly atmosphere. Great service, too.

hzYdH_R3ANsjG1kU2nRKHg.text: My favorite little hideaway. Totally a locals bar, but don't let that fool you. The food is absolutely amazing. I've eaten here a few times and it has never been a disappointment. I've introduced a few people to this place and they have become regulars as well. Don't miss out on this place!

k6dlSAd1KTtMNnzraV2dDg.text: Service was spot on , Pickles chose salt and pepper wings and a southwest cardiac burger that were amazing as well as there French dip was the best I've had in a long time , when I come back to Scottsdale I will be back here too

Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Ql83ADm8miP-rTorkuC3-w.text: Loved this place! its small, but the staff treats you so nice and very friendly atmosphere. Food was delicious! they make everything in house and you can tell. Had the burger and it lived up to the hype.

YO5Mt_QPoE4TPN3bQ3K0Jw.text: Had the beef nachos, the cardiac arrest burger, as well as the green chili Mac and cheese. All were beyond delicious highly recommend and will be back again.

L6wdLk_ZG9-i5wGJN6Ohyw.text: This is a wonderful little restaurant!  My wife & I had lunch here and the service was excellent.  Highly recommend the Jalapeno Club & a salad with creamy avocado lime dressing.

g8X4SwArT6ZRcBFuEr3vQw.text: If you're looking for a bar that makes you feel like family, then this is the place to be. Small and cozy with an great beer selection and even better food menu.   I highly recommend the Teriyaki chicken sandwich. It was mouth watering and to die for. I wish I had room for more. I would of ordered a second one.

MOpPn00iEhRQbKfxTzncpQ.text: Really great food & friendly staff. Scott was especially helpful with menu selections & customer service. Excellent burgers and sandwiches with fresh breads & ingredients. Good place to watch sports.

W2kTnhA3rxSbSn8dWPQNnw.text: One of our personal favorites on the menu is the Green Mary Lou. If you have never heard of one (don't worry, we didn't either) the Green Mary Lou is an extra large flour tortilla stuffed with Queso Dip, topped with Karsen's fabulous homemade Machaca Beef, green chili sauce and Cheddar & Jack Cheese. Wow. But we warn you, it's definitely a meal so come hungry! During the summer, the Green Mary Lou is one of the Cool Summer Specials and at $5, it leaves money still in your wallet for that adult beverage! See our complete review here... schmoozeaz.com/blog/?p=8...

bDlYBXoyJrXWjF_thh8sLQ.text: Best little pub in oldtown by far. Love the service and the atmosphere, will definitely be back here for a few more beers!

0rV2xeWpJnsBwmijkTbTzg.text: The chipotle chicken sandwich was very tasty, w onion rings & cheddar. A cozy friendly atmosphere where the bartenders introduce themselves and call you by name.

yPK1VTsmGU7BqoSAIK7ZBg.text: Ugh soo disappointing! Ordered Cajun chicken salad but got the Buffalo chicken instead. Ordered takeout and didn't check it before leaving! It's okay tho cuz I *almost* ordered the Buffalo chicken salad anyway. Well, the chicken was hella dry and bland except for the buffalo sauce. I also ordered the Cuban sandwich which was okay. Too much BBQ sauce. Why do they call it a Cuban sandwich? It's more like a BBQ sandwich with a slice of ham. The pickles in it were good and I liked the bread.

5gK6DA5DuVR6dKUAf9T-gw.text: Check out the new menu, best of the best remains, with some great new goodies. Heidi is the best and Rocky is doing a great job of keeping it real...plus adding some great atmosphere Keep it up folks. Best little Bar and Grill on the planet...I should know...I travel the whole  world

RW9KthdCYyvTppPQtVBEZw.text: This was our first visit, 2 local couples and 5 out-of-towners. We met for lunch on Saturday at 11:30. My first impression was that the place is smaller than I expected. I'll speak to my wife's and my lunch. She said her burger and fries were very good. I had the pulled pork sandwich, which was also very good. I ordered the sweet potato fries, which are difficult to make crispy. I've had crispy, so it can be done. These fries were probably the droopiest sweet potato fries I've had. Next time I'll get the regular fries. Our wait-person was very attentive, but not overbearing. We will be back!!

a8JCRXGAPiGMIPhZjIzVQg.text: Scott is a fantastic greeter and server!  We had the Mac and Cheese Stix, Jalapeno Club and Karsen's Kuhns sandwiches...  excellent flavors!!  This grill/bar place is small but a comfortable hangout

ni-d-WAAObO5WAZ8rBOD4Q.text: Very close and friendly staff that definitely seems to care about their customers. Food is definitely made by an artist that cares about quality. I will no doubt return to this place

jhC6v8xR2a4VkmDZa2ddtw.text: This bar & grill is small in size but the food, staff, and drinks are far from that. If you walk out disappointed you're most likely a high maintenance smock that doesn't deserve to eat here.

l6EyhL8xc16bg1hEPQgfFg.text: Rocky was great! Recommended the jalapeno club wrap to my friend (devoured it). I had the club with blackened chicken which was super fresh and yummy! Also the chicken noodle soup is so creamy and yummy!

BpneP4gy3HX5X4rLDq7mWg.text: I don't know how this place got the reviews it did.  Our waitress was really nice but our food (pork tacos) tasted like crap.  Our drinks were store margarita mix.  I guess I'm use to real hand mixed margaritas and tacos from real Mexican places.  Won't be coming here again.

Iur7SsCd6sEGUHPMtqrbyA.text: This place was very interesting. The bf and I came in after having dinner earlier. The bartender was very friendly, she reminded me of Kate hudsons character in Almost Famous. She kind of pushed us into tequila shots but I definitely didn't put up a fight and had a good time.

D9tIuZ8A-edOvPkSwmajkA.text: We spent new years day in Old-town Scottsdale and then spent another good 20 minutes looking up yelp restaurants and walking to different parts of old-town to find they were closed on New Years day.  We passed this restaurant and it smelled really good, but I'm ashamed to admit we bypassed it because it didn't look as cutesy as the other restaurants we were looking at.  Plus it wasn't on the first page of yelp ;).  Finally after striking out for the 3rd time, I stopped and yelped the restaurant name and it came up with great reviews.  I was not disappointed at all.  I got their chipotle burger special while my family respectively ordered their cuban sandwich, french dip and another burger plate.  The food was great and the service was phenomenal!  Our drinks never made it past the halfway mark and he made sure we had everything we wanted right away.  Next time I'll be trying that cuban sandwich, I snuck a bite off my mom's and it was very tasty and I loved the (french?) bread.  My new years resolution is to try a restaurant without the compulsive need to yelp it and to trust my nose over the exterior of a place.

DWOXMq3o7YHTehlEqNXYUg.text: Great place for lunch; good food and fun atmosphere!  I had the Buffalo Chicken Salad and my companions had the Cuban Sandwich and French dip. All of it was excellent. This is a really small place and Scott was taking care of everything. He is like a really gregarious energizer bunny or just super funny and hyperactive. It works really well  will definitely return.

xgy9hZhneEGO9LHic4N4AQ.text: Are you kidding me?  So tiny, so warm, so awesome!  Went there for lunch today. I had the pulled pork sandwich and my girlfriend had the brisket sandwich. Both were outstanding!  Also had the Green Mary Lou appetizer. Holy crap it was good!    As far as customer service, these people "get it." They were genuinely happy that we were there and made us feel so welcome.  Friendly, warm, and attentive.    We left smiling, knowing that we had found another "go to" gem in Scottsdale!  Can't wait to go back again.  Maybe tomorrow...

lQN2cjVLjzPSaJ6FdJFMug.text: My daughters and I stumbled upon this place looking for some appetizers and a cold drink in Old Town. We were pleasantly surprised by the friendly service by Ringo and Rocky and the extensive menu. We shared fried pickles and salt and pepper wings. It was so good. We were offered many choices for sauces for our wings. Unfortunately, we did not try any entrees but will be back for those another time! Love how they promote their neighboring businesses too. We will see you soon.

dxtFWchrMyUN_eX1AIxfMw.text: Scott Wick is the best bartender ever! He makes you feel super welcome and a part of the Karsen's family. He makes some of the best drinks in Old Town. Ask him for a surprise or tell him what you like and he'll come up with something genius! I've had the Cuban, Green Chile Pasta, Chicken Wrap, Pretzel, and more... every single one is above the norm. This is not bar food. This is to-die-for food! Follow them on Facebook to see pictures of daily specials and you'll be coming here for lunch everyday. Happy hour specials are bomb too! Come get a taste of the True Old Town feel here! You won't be sorry!

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

XM90SybC2itpx896Ak-GYw.text: All the places on the main drag (Scottsdale) had lines out the door so we found this place on Yelp.  This place is small and we had a big group, but they were very accommodating.  Very friendly staff. The food was outstanding.  Everyone ordered something different and everyone raved about their food.  You can tell this place is a treasure for locals who are trying to avoid the Spring Training crowd.

XO1uAqrlkZCTjsO7ZxsmyA.text: This is a dive bar with surprising good food in the heart of old town Scottsdale.  This was my third visit to Karsen's and each time I have been impressed with the experience.  It is not likely to be a place you just pop in to when driving by, but you should.  While a little rough around the edges, the food and service is outstanding and the prices are fair.   The dry rub wings are outstanding.

7OoIK5P5yugYWx0kTW13lQ.text: Karsen's protein bowl is the best meal I've had while in Scottsdale! Super fresh and tasty. Cute bar and restaurant in Old Town. Super friendly staff. I'd bet the happy hour is a blast. It's 115 degrees outside and nice and cool and comfortable in here.

MW630S3Cdvol5yAFVWFLhA.text: I honestly don't know what was better, the service (Scott) or the food. We had the red bird sandwich and soup. I asked Scott if he owned the place and he said no, but you couldn't tell by the way he took care of us and everyone else in the cafe.

QbaWmrbDw3mKr2UKiy2APQ.text: Great service. Amazing fresh food! We were traveling and saw good yelp reviews. Definitely happy we made a stop in after our Camelback Mountain hike. It's a small little restaurant, but you will not regret it

JMJZxyMW0l1_gCd_9zXU2A.text: Small place but the personality of the staff is big. Small menu as well but apparently everything is made in house so I can imagine why. I had the hot hot dog and it was okay. Seemed like it sat for a while before served as the queso was cold and the jalapeno were fresh from the pickle jar rather that freshly sliced or grilled so that made it pretty bland

9dBJU_-rO2A0cBKfikZl-g.text: Cute little bar, no draft beer but several bottle choices. Food was good ! Would definitely be back.

NpHCfc51VjxeQakKyXx5BA.text: Outstanding food. Spicy perfect, just enough! We enjoyed a lovely lunch while watching a game. We will be back.

errw7K8zbH362hhnT5-3Tg.text: We had Scott Wick as our server & he provided excellent customer service from the moment we stepped in the door! He's very friendly without being overbearing & makes you feel comfortable immediately. I ordered the Mac & Cheese dish and it was so good! Huge portion, too.

2x4Jwc5cv0I0MO2XHLB5Ig.text: Stopped by chance on our way to catch our flight home to NJ. Great service! Great food! Highly recommend.

B1YzoTmHyFXpXCz7vRqQbw.text: I loved this little hole in the wall.  It is so tiny we almost missed it, but I was definitely worth it to turn around and try again.  When you first walk in you think it is a bar First and foremost; there are maybe four or five or so bar tables with stools inside.  Only two small 4-too tables outside.  But the Yelp reviews on the food told us to give it a try, and so glad we did.  Two of us got the Jalapeno club, the other got the French Dip.  Sooooo yummy.  Potato salad (okay), sweet potato fries (interesting, with a little bit of sweet stuff on top), and steak fries (cooked to perfection).  The bartender/server Scott was a delight.  If I'm back in town I'm definitely going back!

9Kd8bs_kziS7tPQORbHYIg.text: Stopped in Karsen's out of chance after walking around Old Town. The bartender was incredibly friendly and helpful. The food was OUT OF THIS WORLD. I ordered the Southwest Cardiac and my girlfriend ordered the Cuban sandwich. The burger was INCREDIBLE. The meat was flavorful and all the topping complimented the burger. I got a side of onion rings, which the bartender suggest I order their ranch on the side. Boy did he know what he was talking about. The ranch & onion ring combo was AMAZING. I tried some of the Cuban and it too was delicious. My gf got their steak fries on the side and they too were AMAZING!!!! The portions were HUGE and so were the flavors! Would definitely recommend to anyone!!! Will definitely be back SOON!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

W1ZjQW2QKFA3A4Kv1j9ecg.text: The food was very delicious, and there was no wait. The service was fast and friendly. I would come again.

8hpK0gh_nUkr4Fs85SU_Bg.text: This is a super small, quiet, local bar. No frills, down to earth small town friendly vibe. When we sat we were asked our names and when we left we were addresses by both of our names. This only happens in small town homegrown places. We ordered the green chili mac and cheese sticks, the Karsen's Kuban, and the Sante Fe Plate... all of it was great. Hard to choose a favorite. Everything was fresh and you could taste it was hand crafted plates. If we could make one recommendation it would be add some craft beer choices .... this would be the most effect place for it!

7YhzswwqF4VqQh4z9DTHqw.text: Karsen's Grill has the best bar food in Scottsdale! Make sure to try the fried pickles and MAC n' Cheese sticks!!!  Can't wait to come back to Scottsdale and eat there again!!

s9axfh44qHAmXALpv6BtfQ.text: This is one of my spots. I'm going to miss it when I move away. Excellent food, great staff, definitely stop in. It's small so too many people make the mistake of walking past. Don't! The food is far better than you'd expect. Jacob is a master in the kitchen making simple but delicious dishes, and everything fresh from scratch.

i_hbmVoEn1MjOiurl5FDjQ.text: One of those great hidden gems located in old town. Been around forever. Great menu, drink selection & prices!

gf0Dc-9olOuw8zj81RA9pg.text: The southwest cardiac is amazing.  I'm for some bowling now!  The Friday night pacific cod was also great. Be back soon guys!

txI8c61w7oGYzizfxRl3Lg.text: Stopped in since we were in the area...the cuban pork sandwich was amazing!  First bite was good, second bite was delish, third bite was heaven.  Got a winner on that one.  Fun, friendly I would go back.

jxmDQ9HCL17uZ1cpHqmjGQ.text: This is a great bar.  Friendly people, attentive service,  good food, and the beer is always cold.  We come here every week for the last 2 years!

k7Yg82TandiMSK2uTVKxhA.text: Phenomenal food and outstanding service - you must try the 'Mary Lou'

jMjc3rMDFXdTzUxb0tCVvQ.text: Great little place with better than avg. burgers and awesome french fries.  What really stood out, though, is the awesome customer service.  Super nice staff!  Makes you kind of feel like you're at home.  They tease you and mess around light heartedly.  Very enjoyable!

jX47JtgFK9tTtqCk0RJ6Xw.text: Excellent little gem of a neighborhood restaurant! Their sandwich bread is amazing and their sandwiches are huge! The main bartender/waiter who was there on Monday was the friendliest guy and made us feel welcome the minute we walked in the door. This place is tiny, but what it lacks in space it makes up for with the food! I highly recommend this grill to anyone in the Scottsdale area!

dZnAcJKnWrBcDEUVrHgvVg.text: Under promises and over delivers!  Truly homemade, delicious chow. Not your usual pub grub. Yup, it' s a tiny hole in the wall.  But it' really big on service and excellent adult beverages. Nice surprise was Tracy Dempsey desserts top off the Monday Night Pork Chop Special. Yum. We'll be back. Soon.

WmvlYFzDXvqH3kWSt_iI-g.text: since introduced to KG's over 10 years ago (by Big Pete of Oregano's) i've been a huge fan and always sure to visit when i'm in town. stopping by is like visiting an old friend (the place is uber small) where you say hi to John or TR behind the bar and they remember you.  a little (pun intended) description: its a small bar that serves OK food (burgers and the like). very basic TV's. Most importantly, its where your likely to find yourself making new friends. It's frequented by local restaurant owners and staff (front and back of house), professional baseball umpires and other interesting folks.

w_FP5hES48QCj8yacpK-kA.text: quiet little bar. really small and cozy. friendly bartender that makes yummy drinks :) kind of hidden on a side street but walking distance from all the other bars and clubs in scottsdale.

ciDxfztstFZTpAydtqy1Jw.text: Karsen's Grill is a great  little spot to go, their food  is great and most of the bartenders are friendly.   With the exception of one bartender I can't  which her name is Liz, she's such a cold fish.  Her attitude is she's doing you a favor by serving you.    I've been a frequent out-of-town customer and never a friendly welcome.   Conversations etc is to be about or evolved about her she doesn't take interest in anyone else,

b1tXPA9QZGT0qi0qL6y5tQ.text: Karsens is the perfect neighborhood place.  The veggie sandwich, veggie plater, veggie quesadilla, and grilled cheese (w/ tomato and green chili) are all really good and the fries are always hot and crispy.  Make sure ot introduce yourself to TR - he knows everyone in Scottsdale!

ACunbph-GXnTx7S9BalALw.text: The food and service were excellent. We ordered the pull pork sandwich and the Scottsdale salads. Both items were flavorful. We had wonderful service and sat outside on the patio. We would recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a local spot.

LTau-1x9nmI9395Ow0EJjw.text: At first glance this place looks like a bar in a strip mall. It is so much more than that. The bartenders were great and had good recommendations on local beer/wines. I had the three cheese grilled cheese with bacon. Differently a great twist on a classic.

R4TrnrHFCjzpJi-KgDL9Vw.text: I must have walked past this place hundreds of times before I even knew it was there.  I was invited here for a meeting of a local pet welfare group I'm involved with.  Our meeting was a small group, so this place was perfect.    Great location, great food, great prices and great service.  They even have a $5 food menu.  Cons - Very small.  Seats maybe 20 people.

9EJ9yzAZYdugkZo3_HbYuA.text: Karsen is the best industry bar in oldtown. The tuna sandwich is great too!!!

r0DAUqRFYhLEH3jmzASHxA.text: I loved their customer service!' Prob one of the best!! When my friend and I walked in it was dead but the bartender (I believe the owner) greeted us and throughout our stay he was so nice! We never had a prob having an empty water cup! The food was good too. I got the burger and it tasted like the ones u can make at your house! Very tasty.

tpxOREMkty7UYB0aNRiFiA.text: Great little place with lots of charm and character.  Staff was very friendly and personable, food was tasty and prices were reasonable.  Good value.  Our family had a great meal here!

P2D9d6HVJDKGucn92aTmkQ.text: Came across this while walking Old Town Scottsdale.  We were having trouble finding a place open for a late lunch at 3pm, so we picked this. The bartender is the server and the inside seating is all bar stools and high tables so this is not the best place for comfort.  We both ordered chesseburgers that were fantastic.  They have a few TV's on with sports and the staff was very friendly.  I would suggest this if you want a burger and don't mind sitting on bar stools.  I do think there were tables outside but we did not chose to sit outside.

m6LSMIdfjaoLjms16-j3kg.text: Great easy going atmosphere. Jim is friendly and manages the bar as well as the tables. Try the veggie quesadilla or the Sunday burritto special. Not a lot of seats and easy to miss. Nice wine and beer selection, but could use some local brews.

JjoBDJqyJQ_0--XLY47ihw.text: Everyone is right that this place is (very) tiny and friendly.  However, the service is a little slow, and the food just isn't that great.  I mean, Yelp's "A-OK" description about sums it up.  Nothing awful, but nothing awesome either.  My friend tried their signature dish, the Mary Lou.  Again, nothing great.  It was okay, but we were expecting something in the burrito style, and it came out more like a quesadilla.  Also, the flavor of the machaca beef was okay, but I've definitely had way better.  And yes, I would say that the Mary Lou would feed two people pretty well.  Basically, I am not sure if I would go back.  It is rare that I am so entirely ambivalent about a food place, but this place (un)inspires it.

xRpmj0kZ42JohQ_0xBa39A.text: The owner is extremly friendly. Great place as all the other Yelpers have said. I ordered the Blackened chicken sandwich with patato salad. Not too spicy, but just right. The patato salad was extremly good. If your out and about in the afternoon looking for lunch, stop in here.

gAxEbja-Rn-6AiaL9HHmfg.text: Place was good. Very friendly owners. Menu was good if you're looking to stay with a familiar territory. I could defintely tell this was a place many regulars go. We found John to be a very nice guy.

TZoIaRTNGpTuRIn3mZceTg.text: For a small bar/grill in Scottsdale it's great. Ray is the owner/operator, very friendly, and wants to give good service. Give it a try. The burgers are delicious!

1zvNAKNpy30dhYL1-ShA2g.text: Saw it on Yelp. Loved it!! I will be back often. Had the hot wings, frys, iced tea, and a lot of great service. It is a MUST in Old Town!!

Bp5cjmWh4VK_D6Ze6QdeDQ.text: The Monday Night Pork Chop Special (MNPCS) was really good, as were the mashed potatoes! My mates tried the Turkey Ruben and the Club Sandwich - both were said to be quite edible... This is a very affordable dinner for the old town area. I saw what looked to be several "regulars" hanging at the bar. Karsen's will also deliver to several local bars that don't serve food! (J Chew, Rusty Spur, Patties...) Also note that this place is TINY. manta.com/coms2/dnbcompa...

I1bt2tflWf5y8SEmNNW1DA.text: Karsen's Grill is the greatest little joint in Scottsdale.  Fabulous burgers, great sandwiches and surprisingly good salads.  It's really small, but you'll feet like an old-timer on your first visit.  Very pleasant staff.   I used to live live in Scottsdale and was a regular customer.  I miss Karsen's Grill!

kRrMBGkS92HHpFDtESD5mg.text: did a pickup for lunch today, ordered the cuban and it was delish!!!  will be back

cWdYdnCSaCycy_UCbd72Bw.text: Delightful, we were there for Sunday brunch. Great food, pleasant conversation and very reasonable.  Making a point to return for dinner.

en1PxsOoXiy-Qbm62jxcvQ.text: Our first time to Old Town Scottsdale & found this little hole in the wall...it was great! Our waitress was friendly & helpful. We ordered the pulled pork tacos (delicious!) & hamburger special. Everything was flavorful & well prepared. Super small place, but I highly recommend it.

rSbRKsajaYt50FDOR6XFAQ.text: Karsen's is a great laid back bar. Everyone (staff and patrons) is very friendly so it has the neighborhood pub vibe. Attention Scottsdale DBs...please do not come here. You will not like it and the regulars don't care.

Db6SbecQn-yLUz0akNf-ZQ.text: Great reasonably priced place! Good sandwiches the potato skins were good and my fish an chips was yummy!

C52Z_DeZIPbYwyUYr00BBQ.text: Small place but they seem to turn tables quickly. Hot dog was great and nachos were good. Beer was in cans or bottle. No draught beer. Seats at the bar. If you are in the neighborhood, it is worth a try.

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hot dog and nachos

5PsBpFThsAK76yQ4FrX3eA.text: Lived in old town for 7-8 years and finally decided to wander in here.  I thought it was just a small bar for random spring training fans to stumble into, but it has some seriously good food all made from scratch!  I was with a decent sized group and we each shared a little of what we ordered and it was all delicious.  Manager came over and gave us a rundown of his favorite items.  Super nice guy, and I wish I came in here sooner!  Burgers were on point!

Fh0YnO7mfwScR3hd-QoBzg.text: This is a cute little bar in Old Town Scottsdale and you would never suspect that they have great food.  I did not try a drink, but the bartender has a fully stocked bar.  All who ordered mixed drinks seemed to be enjoying them. Nice selection of wings (a variety of styles), apps, a daily soup, sandwiches, etc. I opted for an Italian beef sandwich.  It was in a roll which held up well to the "gravy."  Ample amount of very tasty, thinly shredded beef on it.  I selected the sweet potato fries as my side.  They cut all their own potatoes fresh there and you could tell.  The fries were delicious, with just a hint of salt and cinnamon sugar.  I don't eat fries often, and these were definitely worth it.  It was friendly and inviting, and seems like a great place for locals as well as a drop-by tourist.

iP5EuCSIFDnR5V_U0fL7xw.text: The Randall was delicious and not something I can get everywhere. I would also recommend the onion rings. Everything tasted fresh! I was happy to find this hidden restaurant.

mcIMm6aemAuny9g8qUXAxA.text: Bomb sweet potato fries. Maybe the best I've ever had anywhere. Cinnamon sugar flavor. Crispy. Made from scratch. Everything on the menu looked good but I went with the Cuban and it didn't disappoint. Next time I'll be trying the Mary Lou. Friendly staff. Good soundtrack. I don't frequent old town much but I'll be back to this spot.

C9yG1LS-DnIOOlayQCWpHg.text: My wife and I have lived in Old Town Scottsdale for a year, and there are plenty hidden gems to find and dine. I almost hate writing this review because I selfishly don't want anyone to know about this amazing Bar . The food is to die for and I have posted photos on Yelp as well. I don't care about portion size, what I care about is quality food and Karsen's nails it. Honestly, it's a very small Bar, but the Owner "Rocky" and Scott make you feel like you are part of a family, where "Everybody knows your name". I could go on and on about this place. if you live in the area or visiting from out of State, stop in and enjoy amazing food and outstanding service. Karsen's has become are goto place to dine in Scottsdale, so check it out and enjoy the best kept secret in Old Town!

Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Salt &amp; Pepper Wings and Steak Fries are amazing!

cr4rETQ3-h7YatRq6nAnHg.text: Visiting from out of town. Found this place on Yelp and we were very pleased!!! Owner was amazingly friendily and welcoming. He made great suggestions and we were not disappointed. Would come again for sure.

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

CbP7XPnxAOCYifOTpjFlfQ.text: I'm not a big Yelper but this place deserved a review.  Me and my mother came in for lunch while on vacation and was blown away with the experience.  We were greeted as soon as we walked in and were treated like family.  The food did not disappoint.  We got the queso dip as an appetizer and it was unbelievable,  we could tell it was fresh and it was super creamy.  The burgers where juicy and flavorful without all the extra sauces and toppings, and the sweet potato fries were great.  They were sweet but savory at the same time and really satisfying.  I  am definitely coming back here before we leave.  Between the friendly atmosphere and great fresh food it really will not let you down.

IFWmXL0qkE_tHuJRjrWC_Q.text: This place is awesome!!!! I stumble on this place looking fir a place to eat on YELP and came across it. I just had cross this place a hundred times before I finally went in. It's really small inside but the staff is super friendly. They were on top of the water refill which I'm huge on. Everything is made fresh I hade the sliders which were money. I'm definitely going back

v0Zd1sfeJRfAPtVqxPAjbQ.text: Best bar food in Scottsdale. Great wings. Try the salt and pepper style. The owners are awesome

nuggpuMPPzU8yF2nWiohkw.text: There's something special about this place. It's small, cozy, has great good and the staff is awesome. Whenever I'm in town I always try to stop at Karsen's Grill.

c9DSjOI1PsRGlVmu6MoPrw.text: Hands down my favorite restaurant in Metro Phoenix!! Been here a couple times and have never once been disappointed with the service or food!!

TYdi0wsD3v2TW4-uWqAzOQ.text: Extremely friendly, excellent location for Old Town or baseball, and really good food.  Not remotely painful like so much in that part of town -- actually really enjoyable!

tsOeNUworXg-MJIU_3PKlw.text: I have a second home here in Old Town, I have walked/drove/scootered past this so many times.   Thanks to Yelp, we decided to stop in for some wings, burgers and fries.  So glad we did, great food and drink.

fmnZDbiidCFZ1dt0WQ5pCg.text: HOLY DIVE BAR HEAVEN! I don't know how I grew up and live just minutes away without hearing about Karsen's OR have not come across it on Yelp yet! {Their reviews speak for themselves.} I was in the area, starving, and wanting to try something new so I whipped out my handy dandy Yelp app and came across this hidden gem!   It is a tiny, dark, fab little spot. I ordered their club and it was literally the best club that i've ever had in my life. From the buttery melt-in-your-mouth sourdough, to the crispy bacon, ham, turkey, avocado, candied jalapenos, jalapeno cream cheese, and more it was just a heavenly sandwich that I haven't stopped raving about {or craving} since I left. ALSO - THEIR HAND CUT FRIES. You guys, these are some of the best fries that i've ever had in my life! They're thick cut and seasoned to perfection. Pro Tip: They also have dreamy ranch, if you're a ranch fanatic like me! My husband had their Friday special which was the Panko crusted + parmesan fish and chips. He also said they were phenomenal.   We will absolutely be back! My dad LOVES dive bars so I can't wait to bring him here!! It is also worth mentioning that the service was quick and friendly!

photos.caption: Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The best club ever!!!
Photo of Karsen's Grill - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fish and chips Friday special!

g2E_7F3-i8Y8TNU7_QVeUQ.text: You would never even know this place was here just by walking by- it's tucked away in a row of stores. This has to be the best kept secret in Old Town Scottsdale. AMAZING, made from scratch menu and some of the nicest staff you will ever meet. You must try the hand cut sweet potato fries. The sandwiches, burgers, and bowls are all amazing. All of the dressings/sauces are even made from scratch. The chef has taken some time and effort on the menu and it shows. This is a smaller more private place than all of the other bars/restaurants in the area and it gives the place a charming atmosphere that can not be matched. Stop reading this and go check it out:) You will not be disappointed.

U1YdNEOACJZe8ibKgq1G7Q.text: Wow what a cool little spot! The waitress made us feel so welcome immediately. I got the jalapeno club, it has candied jalepeno cream cheese and the fries were amazing. Awesome hole in the wall highly recommend!

cp1ic-QK1iOedPDfwQic-A.text: What a great find! Excellent service by Wick (like the candle :) ) and the food was delicious! Our office is only a few minutes away and we will be back! My husband loved the Jalapeno brined fried pickles and my burger was so good! Our sodas & waters were never empty...highly recommend!

mi2MHbqHTG2BO7hI9iKNgQ.text: We went with a party of 4. We ordered fried pickles a cardiac arrest burger,  some drinks and two more items I can't remember,  but ohhhh so so delicious.  I really enjoyed this place and it is on my "must visit" for all the future cactus league seasons.

sOJYOkknokA2YUiVojt_JA.text: Great little grill if your in the area. The service was good and the food was delicious. This is the hands down best lunch spot in the area. (be sure to try the fries!)
